amendment.description: Amendment sought to insert clarifying language to the bill relating to best practices in building codes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to insert clarifying language to the bill relating to best practices in building codes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 168 - 249 (Roll no. 1069).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Roskam.
